channel.title: Telegraf on DevOpsTales
channel.description: Recent content in Telegraf on DevOpsTales

item.title: Configurate ipmitool
item.description: The Intelligent Platform Management Interface (IPMI) is a set of computer interface specifications for an autonomous computer subsystem that provides management and monitoring capabilities independently of the host CPU, firmware (BIOS or UEFI) and operating system.

item.title: Install telegraf on pfsense
item.description: Install and configure telegraf on pfsense to provides system information to prometheus.
